Table 4: Contribution of each factorization module. All four 
STRF modules FFM(t, ? ), FFM(t, ?) FFM(s, ? ), and FFM(s, ?) 
show improvement individually and collectively with the P3DC 
baseline on MARS [58].

Table 5: Per-stage influence of STRF. All four STRF modules 
are effective at various stages, with best results at Stage 2 and 3 of 
STRF-P3DC on MARS [58].
